sentences.sContent: The firework went off in a cascade of colour.
sentences.sContent_eng: The firework went off in a cascade of colour.
sentences.sCn: 烟火散开像一片五彩缤纷的瀑布。

sentences.sContent: It should not have a cascade of menus or waterfall of words in which the user will get lost.
sentences.sContent_eng: It should not have a cascade of menus or waterfall of words in which the user will get lost.
sentences.sCn: 它不应该有层叠的菜单或瀑布式单词，这样会让用户感到迷惑。

trans.tranOther: a small steep  waterfall  that is one of several together
